[Dragonwatch: Return of the Dragon Slayers]: A Review

IT'S HERE! IT'S HERE!! IT'S HERE!!! The FINALE of the Dragonwatch series, a sequel series to Fablehaven, is here!! It released Tuesday and you better believe I preordered a copy and finished it in 24 hours. This book was amazing!! In preparation for the release, I read all 5 Fablehaven books, the previous 4 Dragonwatch â€¦
